mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (crew_id, writer_id, category, title, content, view_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{crewId}, #{writerId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.crew_id AS crewId, b.category, b.title, b.content, b.view_count AS viewCount, b.created_at AS createdAt, u.user_id AS writerId, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.profile_image AS writerProfileImage FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT board_id AS id, crew_id AS crewId, writer_id AS writerId, category, title, content, view_count AS viewCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.category, b.title, b.view_count AS viewCount, b.created_at AS createdAt, u.user_id AS writerId, u.nickname AS writerNickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.board_id = b.board_id) AS commentCount FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE b.crew_id = #{crewId} AND b.category = #{category} ORDER BY b.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{request.title}, content = #{request.content}, category = #{request.category}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
